Quarterstaff (Weapon, Arcane Focus), (attunement optional)

A hollow metal staff adorned with countless tiny, round bells and topped with a single brass cowbell. You gain a +1 bonus to spell attacks on spells cast while holding this staff and weapon attack rolls made with this staff. The staff deals 1d4 additional force damage on a hit when used in a melee weapon attack.

While attuned

You know the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.DTPPMUPRVRY3XXMS]{Salvo} cantrip and can cast the spell @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.FZ8CHP8N6M0PGLI1]{Discombobulate} once from the staff without spending mana. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for these spells. Once you cast @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.FZ8CHP8N6M0PGLI1]{Discombobulate} from the staff, you regain the ability to cast it from the staff again at the next dawn.
